title: Hirokazu Yagi
text:
(born 26 December 1959) is a Japanese former <a href="ski%20jumping">ski jumper</a>.
Career.
His best-known finish was a Silver Medal in the Individual Normal Hill at the <a href="1980%20Winter%20Olympics">1980 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Lake%20Placid%2C%20New%20York">Lake Placid, New York</a>, (Tied with <a href="Manfred%20Deckert">Manfred Deckert</a> of <a href="East%20Germany">East Germany</a>).
